list.expr: sum(ALERTS{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", alertstate="firing", alertname=~"ticdc.*"}) by (alertname) > BOOL 0
list.name: All TiCDC alerts

panels.description: The lag between changefeed coordinator checkpoint ts and the tso of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed Checkpoint Lag

panels.description: The lag between changefeed coordinator resolved ts and the tso of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed Resolved Ts Lag

panels.description: The number of dml events that sink flushes to downstream per second.
panels.title: Sink Event Row Count / s

panels.description:
The status of each changefeed.

0: Normal

1: Pending

2: Failed

3: Stopped

4: Finished

5: Removed

6: Warning

7: Uninitialized

-1: Unknown
panels.title: The Status of Changefeeds

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_dispatchermanager_table_event_dispatcher_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (instance, changefeed)

panels.description: Changefeed memory quota

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_dynamic_stream_memory_usage{k8s_cluster=~"$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", area=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", module=~"event-collector"}) by (keyspace_name, area, instance, module, type)

panels.title: Memory Quota

panels.title: Changefeed Resolved Ts Lag

panels.description: The number of changed rows that are written to downstream per second
panels.title: Sink Write Rows / s

panels.description: 99.9% of TiCDC sink write durations.
panels.title: Sink Write Duration

panels.description:
The number of changefeed in different status

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Changefeed Status

panels.description: duration for each operator for changefeed
panels.title: Coordinator Operator Cost Duration

panels.title: Maintainer Checkpoint Lag

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_changefeed_maintainer_counter{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (keyspace_name, changefeed, instance)

panels.description: Event Service Available Memory
panels.title: Event Service Available Memory

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_dispatchermanager_table_event_dispatcher_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (instance, changefeed)

sum(ticdc_dispatchermanager_table_trigger_event_dispatcher_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (instance, changefeed)

panels.description: Duration of dispatcher creation
panels.title: Create Dispatcher Duration

targets.expr: sum(rate(ticdc_sink_handle_dispatcher_request{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}[1m])) by (keyspace_name,changefeed, instance, type)

panels.description: Row count for batch to the downstream sink.
panels.title: Output Row Batch Count

panels.description: Row count for total output rows.
panels.title: Output Row Count (per second)

panels.description: DDL count and executing duration
panels.title: Output DDL Executing Duration

panels.description: Count of running DDL in the last minute.
panels.title: Sink Running DDL Count / m

panels.description: Count of errors in the last minute.
panels.title: Sink Error Count / m

panels.description: DDL count / minutes
panels.title: Output DDL Count / Minutes

panels.description: Duration of event staying in conflict detector
panels.title: Conflict Detect Duration

panels.description: Full flush (backend flush + callback + conflict detector notify) duration
panels.title: Full Flush Duration

panels.description: Sink worker busy ratio
panels.title: Worker Busy Ratio

panels.description: Distribution of flush transaction duration to backend
panels.title: Backend Flush Duration

panels.description: MQ worker send messages to Kafka, this metric record the time cost on send every message.
panels.title: Worker Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description:
Bytes / second written off all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of Bytes per second
panels.title: Kafka Outgoing Bytes

panels.description: The current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response for all brokers.
panels.title: Kafka Inflight Requests

panels.description:
The request latency in ms for all brokers.

value = request latency histogram's mean

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_request_latency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name",changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (keyspace_name,changefeed, instance, broker, type)

panels.title: Kafka Request Latency

panels.description:
Requests / second sent to all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of events per second
panels.title: Kafka Request Rate

panels.description:
Records count per request send to the kafka
value = one-minute moving average of response receive rate
panels.title: Kafka Records Per Request

panels.description: The compression ratio times 100 of record batches for all topics. Compression ratio = Size of original data / Size of compressed data * 100
panels.title: Kafka Producer Compression Ratio

panels.description: MQ worker batch multiple messages into one when using batched encode protocol, this metric record the time cost on batch messages.
panels.title: Worker Batch Duration Percentile

panels.description: MQ worker batch multiple messages into one when using batched encode protocol, this metrics track each batch's size
panels.title: Worker Batch Size Percentile

panels.description: MQ worker send large message to the external storage, this metrics record the message count
panels.title: Claim Check Send Message Count

panels.description: MQ worker send large message to the external storage, this metric record the time cost on send every message.
panels.title: Claim Check Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description: the number of message count of checkpointTs message
panels.title: Worker Send CheckpointTs Message Count

panels.description: this metric record the time cost of the MQ worker encode and send  checkpointTs messages to downstream
panels.title: Worker Encode and Send Checkpoint Message Duration

panels.description:
The total number of tables in different replication states.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Table Replication State

panels.description: The total number of different schedule tasks.

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_scheduler_task{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance",keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (keyspace_name,changefeed, scheduler, task, mode)

panels.title: Schedule Tasks

panels.title: Span Count

panels.description: The total number of tables
panels.title: Table Count

panels.title: Operator Count

panels.description: The number of total operator count
panels.title: Total Operator Count

panels.description: duration for split span do once check
panels.title: Split Span Check Duration

panels.description: duration for each operator
panels.title: Operator Cost Duration

panels.description: The checkpoint ts of the slowest table.
panels.title: Slowest Table Checkpoint

panels.description: The ID of the slowest table
panels.title: Slowest Table ID

panels.description:
The state of the slowest table.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Slowest Table Replication State

panels.description: The resolved ts of the slowest table.
panels.title: Slowest Table Resolved Ts

panels.description: Changefeed memory quota

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_dynamic_stream_memory_usage{k8s_cluster=~"$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", keyspace_name=~"$keyspace_name", area=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", module=~"event-collector-redo"}) by (keyspace_name, area, instance, module, type)

panels.title: Memory Quota
